title: I Want to Edit lk partition to support fastboot binaries
content: based on what i found Oppo removed the fastboot binaries from my phone (Oppo A5s) and since the lk partition is the one that have it by default i would like to know how can i sort of inject the binaries into this partition

comments.text: Your phone has a Mediatek SoC. For those devices it is common not to use fastboot and instead use the special Mediatek flashing software.
@Robert well is there any way i can have fastboot on Mediatek SoC
